author: Martin Cate
description: A Daiquiri that is light on lime and elongated with coconut water. Delicious and very refreshing.
name: Caribeño
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all the ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass
